member.name: T:Deveel.Data.IEntityFieldMapper`1
member.summary: A service that maps a field by name to an expression that selects the field from an entity.
member.typeparam: The type of entity to map the field for.

member.name: M:Deveel.Data.IEntityFieldMapper`1.Map(System.String)
member.summary: Maps the given property name to an expression that selects the property from the entity.
member.returns: Returns an expression that selects the property from the entity.

member.name: T:Deveel.Data.InMemoryRepository`1
member.summary: A repository that uses the memory of the process to store the entities.
member.typeparam: The type of entity managed by the repository.
